column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I made reservations about a month in advance for a Sunday at 5:30 p.m.  It was definitely tricky.  I wanted to make reservations about two weeks prior
column2: but it was impossible!  Oh well
column3: some celebratory dinners are worth waiting for.  If you want to dine at Bavette's
column4: plan ahead.  When we arrived for our reservation
column5: the restaurant had plenty of tables open - and it stayed that way until we left.  Walking in on a Sunday night is definitely a do-able option.
